page.title: 15SHOPPING, RUGELEY
page.content: Rugeley is situated in rural Staffordshire in the Trent Valley some 8 miles from the nearest substantial towns. It is cut off from the West Midlands conurbation by Cannock Chase. Hence the town serves local needs for basic food, hardware and clothes. Supermarkets provide a restricted range of food and other goods at low prices. Most shops in Rugeley are small family businesses occupying the narrow streets and two squares in the town centre. There is a discount furniture warehouse, carpet warehouse and large DIY store belonging to national chains. However many people are willing to travel to Lichfield, Stoke, Stafford and Birmingham to shop for more expensive items. The village of Colton, 2 miles from Rugeley, has only one shop which is a general store and incorporates a sub-post office.
